ida_mp_reject_reason.desc: manual progress opinion selects of invoice delivery flow
ida_mp_reject_reason.item: Goods of contract and invoice is on the industry's blacklist
Contract/invoice arising from in dispute agreement/transaction
Seller business industry is unrelated to invoice's goods
Seller's industry is not suitable to the business license
Info on the uploaded documents does not match
Transferrable invoice as per the Law and Contract/Invoice is not prohibited for transfer

Contract/Invoice provides special regulations like "contract under form of consignment";" returnable goods";"payment upon installation and good test only". Seller's responsibilities are not deemed completed upon delivery of goods.
Invoice period is not within contract's payment period

ida_doublemp_reject_reason.desc: manual progress opinion selects of invoice delivery flow
ida_doublemp_reject_reason.item: Goods of contract and invoice is on the industry's blacklist
Contract/invoice arising from in dispute agreement/transaction
Seller business industry is unrelated to invoice's goods
Seller's industry is not suitable to the business license
Info on the uploaded documents does not match
Transferrable invoice as per the Law and Contract/Invoice is not prohibited for transfer

Contract/Invoice provides special regulations like "contract under form of consignment";" returnable goods";"payment upon installation and good test only". Seller's responsibilities are not deemed completed upon delivery of goods.
Invoice period is not within contract's payment period

smeInbox.item:
Dear Client,
Your application is incomplete. Please click on the link below to fill out the missing information in 3 days.

Suggestion: 2 days -> Agreed to be 3 days by SME
Here are the details of your application
Go to application form (To see specific reason)
Should you need assistance, please refer to our Help menu or email us at cs@i-factor

Best regards,
The i-factor team

Dear Client,
We are sorry, your application has been rejected for violation. For more information, please check out the reasons stated below. Please contact us immediately if the provided reasons are not applicable. -> Changed as suggested by VPB
Here are the details of your application
Go to application form (To see specific reason) One of the following reasons for refusal was discovered:
• Violations of mandatory conditions for the Sellers
Go to application

Dear Client,
Your application has successfully passed our qualification process. Please come to our SME center immediately to sign the service agreement, receive the i-Factor package and perform other necessary procedures. i-Factor customer service will contact you as soon as possible to arrange time and place.
Here are the details of your application
Your client ID: ${apply.sellerId} To the nearest VPBank branch
Service agreement to use the i-Factor platform EF comments: in i-Factor platform, so far we dun have this function, Seller and Buyer can't download the service agreement from platform. In the final version of process, seller and buyer only can go to the branch to sign the contract, no download function. if VPB would like to have this function, it will cause delay and extra cost for this workload. Pls have a review and modify accordingly.

Dear Client,
We are sorry, your application has been closed. Please contact us if the reason is not applicable to you
Here are the details of your application
Reason(s) for application closed:
- Your application is not modified within the time limit
Go to application
